title: An unknown DirectX error has occurred
body: PLZ help me on this problem, i watched youtube, and many solutions web. still cant start the game..plz help me{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: try stating league as an administrstrator

I'm not really sure how I can assist without more information, like where this is happening.  It sounds like your driver is failing though, or possible your hardware.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to repair and update your drivers just in case.  If you still have issues after going over every step, let me know with more details!
